mapper.select: select count(1) from p_baseInfo where personID = #{personID}
mapper.insert: insert into p_baseInfo(personID, photo, tel, address, createUser, createTime, updateUser, updateTime) values( #{personID}, #{photo}, #{tel}, #{address}, #{createUser}, #{createTime}, #{updateUser}, #{updateTime})
mapper.update: update p_baseInfo set photo = #{photo}, tel = #{tel}, address = #{address}, updateUser = #{updateUser}, updateTime = #{updateTime} where personID = ${personID}
